attributes.action: Use lottery funding to create affordable housing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With house prices always on the increase and wages way below this increase it is almost impossible for a family with 1 worker to get onto the property ladder.
As most of the habitable council housing has been sold off,1 worker families are being forced to accept cramped and poorly maintained council housing.
Funding from the lottery should be used to help create affordable housing for poorer families to get on the property ladder,and deffinately not for more GREEDY landlords/buy to let owners!
